column1: Leadership and Management Health and Social Care MSc
column3: Faculty of Environmental and Life Sciences
column5: Join the University of Southampton, a global top 100* university, and acquire the skills to become a health and social care leader of the future. This interdisciplinary programme is work-focused and concentrates on producing visionary leaders who can draw on the latest research and methodology to continuously enhance the quality of care for service users in the UK and worldwide.You will enhance your leadership, managerial, and organisational skills and graduate able to inform strategy and function as a highly competent senior leader in health and social care sectors.*QS World University Rankings 2023.Flexible studyIf you're a UK applicant, you can apply to study this course as:
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 Year Full Time / 2-5 Years Part Time
